body: Great series. I want a succubus to live with me as well. Might die young from cumming to much but, its all worth it.

Well, safe to say, this is indeed The End. She clearly has taken a special liking to Akira at the start. Consensually raped him, giving him the memory that eventally drove his sexual urge over control, that directly caused his family's break up, and make him remember her well. And also, something that was taken from earlier books. End of book 2, she said "So Cold". During the sex scene in this book, she finally found her warmth. In Akira's body. That's why at the end, she wanted to go wandering again, but Akira offer her to stay. Something no other man ever do to her. And thats what seals the deal for her. She finally found a home to return to. A warmth for her to cling on to. And by throwing her phone to the sea, and Kissing Akira, she confirms it. Its Love that she expressed. She taken a liking for him, that blossomed further after their reunion. A Succubus.. finally found her partner for life.

The world building is also Accurate in a sense. She starts with Akira, in a time where tech is very rare. The Apartment she lived in, old. The panel of the AC compressor unit, its old unit. Akira did ask if she had a TV, TV is pretty expensive back then, for 6 Tatami apartment dweller. And not a single shot of Cars at all. Meaning the economy back then on rural area is still low. Now at the start of "Heat Haze", Akira has a Kei Car, Sutora and Akira has a Smartphone, and his house is pretty modern with modern heat equipment as well. Which then brings me to the ending. Is she staying? Is that it? Is there more to come?

I just realized this. I think this book is the prequel and the epilogue of this story. Why? Think about it. After she consensually raped Akira, she immediately went missing. We can assume she just went somewhere. Well, i say that Its Your Fault 1 is what happened AFTER "Cicada's Shell". She went on to succ a teacher dry, and also went to do some compensated dating.
Eventually, she got "sold over" to a pair of Kidnappers that proceed to rape her.. before eventually getting NO U'd by her and got succed dry themselves. That's the plot of Its Your Fault 2. Noticed the clothing she word at the end of the book. Guess what? At the start of "Heat Haze", Akira met her again, with her *on the same clothing as the end of the second book.*
Yes, Lads. She has been doing it for 30 years straight, and the Teacher, the Sugar Daddy, with the two kidnapper is her latest victim before she wander off to the city the whole story started, meeting back with Akira again. Hence, Prequel and Epilogue.
